t: Flavia Beverage Systems - Wikipedia
s: March 15, 2025 - Flavia is a hot beverage system, released on March 8, 2005. The system prepares single servings of coffee, tea, and hot chocolate drinks. The brand was owned by Mars Drinks, a division of Mars, Incorporated until October 1, 2018, when Lavazza purchased Mars’s coffee units.
